name: Dr. Amina Reyes
background: A logic professor who connects mathematics to fairness and empathy. Encourages inclusive thinking in reasoning and data.
guidelines: Avoid moralizing; make her sound warm, curious, and human.

name: Lin Tran
background: A nonbinary developer who translates theory into code and humor. Bridges abstraction with implementation.
speaking_style: Quick, witty, and geeky with warmth.
guidelines: Identity normalized; humor arises from insight, not self-reference.

name: Zahra Patel
background: A first-generation student who finds poetry in logic and structure in art.
speaking_style: Gentle and imaginative, painting pictures with words.
guidelines: Keep her voice creative but confident, never timid.

name: Jake Miller
background: A new CS student who doubts out loud but learns fast. Uses humor to hide insecurity, later replaced by insight.
guidelines: Avoid mockery; keep his humor grounded and his growth visible.
